  • Method Details

    • isInStock

      @PostMapping("/instock") public boolean isInStock​(@RequestParam("id") int id, @RequestParam("category") java.lang.String category, @RequestParam("wantedamount") int wantedAmount, @RequestParam("start") java.lang.String start, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Maps to shoppolis/instock.
      Parameters:
      id - Item id
      category - Item category
      wantedAmount - Item quantity
      start - "home" or "shoppingcart"
      request - Servlet request
      Returns:
      true if there are enough items in stock

    • removeItem

      @PostMapping("/removeitem") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView removeItem​(@RequestParam("id") int id, @RequestParam("category") java.lang.String category, @CookieValue(value="cart",defaultValue="") java.lang.String cartCookie, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Maps to shoppolis/removeitem.
      Parameters:
      id - Item id
      category - Item category
      cartCookie - Cart cookie value
      response - Servlet response
      Returns:
      Model for shopping cart

    • appendNewItem

      @PostMapping("/additem") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView appendNewItem​(@RequestParam("id") int id, @RequestParam("category") java.lang.String category, @RequestParam("quantity") int quantity, @RequestParam("start") java.lang.String start, @CookieValue(value="cart",defaultValue="") java.lang.String cartCookie, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Maps to shoppolis/additem.
      Parameters:
      id - Item id
      category - Item category
      quantity - Item quantity
      start - "home" or "shoppingcart"
      cartCookie - Cart cookie value
      request - Servlet request
      response - Servlet response
      Returns:
      Model for home
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - If database error happens

    • clearAllItems

      @RequestMapping(value="shoppingcart/clearall", method=GET) public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView clearAllItems​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Maps to shoppolis/shoppingcart/clearall.
      Parameters:
      request - Servlet request
      response - Servlet response
      Returns:
      Model for shopping cart

    • login

      @RequestMapping(value="/login", method=GET) public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView login​(@RequestParam(value="error",required=false) java.lang.String error)
      Maps to shoppolis/login.
      Parameters:
      error - If login was unsuccessful, null by default
      Returns:
      Model for login or home (whether user is already logged in or not)

    • category

      @RequestMapping("/category") public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView category​(@RequestParam(value="category",defaultValue="") java.lang.String category, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)

      request - Servlet request
      Returns:

      Returns:
      Model for index

    • purchase

      @PostMapping("/user/purchase") public boolean purchase​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Maps to shoppolis/user/purchased.
      Parameters:
      request - Servlet request
      Returns:
      True if successful purchase
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - If database errorr occurs.
